original_title: Kiss the Blood Off My Hands
overview: Bill Saunders, a former prisoner of war living in England, whose experiences have left him unstable and violent, gets into a bar fight in which he in kills a man and then flees. He hides out with the assistance of a nurse, Jane Wharton, who believes his story that the killing was an accident.
tagline: Only Her Arms Could Tame the Fury of His Fists!
title: Kiss the Blood Off My Hands
